author.persName: Muhammad Yusuf Munshi b. Khwajah Baqa Balkhi.

msItem.title: Tadhkirah-i Muqim-Khani.
msItem.note: Folio one, verso, above text: A history of the Kingdoms of ? from the age of Baber to the time of Soban Koli Khan the grandfather of Abool faiz Khan the last of the house of Timour - purchased in Bochara Author Mokim Khan [sic] Alex? Burnes Bochara July 1832. A History of the Uzbek Khans of Mawara al-Nahr.. Headings and punctuation in red. Some headings omitted.
msItem.incipit: Iftitah-i maqal bi-'aun-i Hadrat-i Wahib-i Dhu 'l-jalal

listBibl.bibl: Storey, i, pp. 379-380. Storey lists no other MS in the British Isles.

bindingDesc.p: Green leather binding, presumably Bukhara with blind-tooling and coloured stamped cartouches. The central cartouches with legend: Waqif-i in nuskha az bahr-i khuda Bi Bi? bint Sayyida Khal Majid? 1225 [sic].

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: History of Central Asia, Uzbek dynasty.
